snippet: What has been holding the Steelers back is their penalty rate. They have a league-worst rate of 0.7 penalty yards per play; the league average is 0.4 yards per play.
abstract: What has been holding the Steelers back is their penalty rate. They have a league-worst rate of 0.7 penalty yards per play; the league average is 0.4 yards per play.

headline.main: N.F.L. Week 6 Game Probabilities: Penalizing Pittsburgh
